title: Power-Ups & Items
description: How well do you know Mario's amazing power-ups?

questions.question: What does the Super Mushroom do?
questions.explanation: The red Super Mushroom transforms small Mario into Super Mario, allowing him to take an extra hit!

questions.question: The Fire Flower lets Mario throw fireballs.
questions.explanation: The Fire Flower turns Mario into Fire Mario, allowing him to throw bouncing fireballs at enemies!

questions.question: What does the Super Star do?
questions.explanation: The Super Star (or Starman) makes Mario invincible temporarily, with a catchy tune playing!

questions.question: Which power-up lets Mario fly with raccoon ears and a tail?
questions.explanation: The Super Leaf transforms Mario into Raccoon Mario (or Tanooki Mario), letting him fly and float!

questions.question: The 1-Up Mushroom is green.
questions.explanation: The green 1-Up Mushroom grants Mario an extra life when collected!

questions.question: What power-up turns Mario into a cat?
questions.explanation: The Super Bell from Super Mario 3D World turns Mario into Cat Mario, who can climb walls and scratch enemies!

questions.question: In Super Mario Galaxy, what item lets Mario spin attack?
questions.explanation: Luma, the star creature, gives Mario the ability to perform spin attacks throughout the game!

questions.question: The Ice Flower lets Mario freeze enemies.
questions.explanation: The Ice Flower turns Mario into Ice Mario, letting him throw iceballs that freeze enemies solid!
